settings.title: WHEN YOU SHOP, GOOD THINGS HAPPEN

settings.section_body: And help keep Appalachian crafts alive.
So we can all enjoy their powerful stories.
Because we ship products in gently reused boxes.

settings.maker_desc: Jessie, the artist behind Knoxville, Tenn.’s Root & Branch Paper Co. is inspired by nature’s intricacy. Whether she’s making a notebook or notecard, her love of plants, mushrooms, and insects always shows in gorgeous detail.
